type.name: org.gradle.plugin.devel.tasks.PluginUnderTestMetadata
type.description: * Custom task for generating the metadata for a plugin user test. * * @since 2.13

method.name: getOutputDirectory
method.description: * The target output directory used for writing the classpath manifest. Defaults to {@code "$buildDir/$task.name"}.

method.name: getPluginClasspath
method.description: * The code under test. Defaults to {@code sourceSets.main.runtimeClasspath}.

property.name: outputDirectory
property.description: * The target output directory used for writing the classpath manifest. Defaults to {@code "$buildDir/$task.name"}.

property.name: pluginClasspath
property.description: * The code under test. Defaults to {@code sourceSets.main.runtimeClasspath}.
